ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | hlsuprexch.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |

| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_cvlexchb2 | |- ( ( K e. CvLat /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ X e. B ) /\ -. P .<_ X ) -> ( P .<_ ( Q .\/ X ) <-> ( P .\/ X ) = ( Q .\/ X ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ X e. B ) /\ -. P .<_ X ) -> ( P .<_ ( Q .\/ X ) <-> ( P .\/ X ) = ( Q .\/ X ) ) ) |
